name: Dogfight Elite
detailed_description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey through history with Dogfight Elite, a thrilling combat simulator set against the monumental backdrop of World War I and II.

Become the master of the skies in Dogfight Elite. Commandeer the cockpit of a warplane, spearhead a tank into battle, or bravely face the enemy on foot as a resilient soldier. The battlefield has never felt this real and the stakes this high.

Test your mettle in solo play, navigating through meticulously designed training missions that escalate to adrenaline-charged, full-scale aerial dogfights against relentless enemy combatants.

While Dogfight Elite is free-to-play, opting for a subscription unlocks a treasure trove of exclusive benefits. Take to the skies or the battlefield with premium airplanes, tanks, and specially-crafted weapons, and embark on captivating, subscriber-only missions.


Moreover, subscribing allows you instant access to our servers and priority queuing, ensuring that your historic battles remain uninterrupted. Experience the past like never before with Dogfight Elite - the battlefield is waiting for you.

If you have any requests/complaints please visit www.dogfightelite.com forums.
I keep track of all requests and complaints and fix them on each release. Write the details or contact me on the website. I will read your posts and fix it asap!

It includes support for VR

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx 9 or 11 if using VR
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 1ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: opengl 2
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
